channel.title: Need help putting server online
channel.description:
ok so my source doesnt have a server.java file. well, it does but it doesnt contain any ips like it should, like it usually says "127.0.0.1". But Mine Doesnt contain ANY. I just need help putting it online and making it so my friends and i can play. its a 474 i believe. im using no-ip and i utorrented. I need help finding out how to put it on and putting up a dl link for my friends to download the server. i know how to put it on mediafire etc. but idk how to put it online... i've tested it on moparscape webclient with my no-ip.org ip address and it worked but i need to connect the no-ip to my server i think. im willing to teamview/skype etc.
Do i Just Change the main ip in client.java to my host ip? like the "server =" ip?

item.title: Need help putting server online
item.dc:creator: @zackary zackary
item.description:
@zackary wrote:

client sided. im trying to make my client downloadable so they can play though.

this is what i found in client.java:

[size=8pt]if((j == 13 || j == 10) && inputString.length() > 0) { if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals("127.0.0.1") || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) { if(inputString.startsWith("//setspecto")) { int amt = Integer.parseInt(inputString.substring(12)); anIntArray1045[300] = amt; if(variousSettings[300] != amt) { variousSettings[300] = amt; method33(300); needDrawTabArea = true; if(dialogID != -1) inputTaken = true; } }[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help putting server online
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Client or Server sided?

You don’t change the IP in the server, and the IP can be in different spots in the client, Either, Client.java, GUI.java, EGUI.java, or Connectionsmanager.java.

Read full topic
